struct.name: EthernetOamAlarmConfig
struct.description: Specification of the defects that raise the Ethernet OAM Service Fault alarm.

structMember.name: errorAlarmTrigger
structMember.description: Specifies whether the alarm is raised for a configuration error defect.

structMember.name: rdiAlarmTrigger
structMember.description: Specifies whether the alarm is raised for an RDI defect.

structMember.name: remoteAlarmTrigger
structMember.description: Specifies whether the alarm is raised for a remote defect.

structMember.name: xConAlarmTrigger
structMember.description: Specifies whether the alarm is raised for a cross-connect defect.

structMember.name: errorCcmDefect
structMember.description: Connection error defect detected, when local MEP has received at least one invalid CCM.

structMember.name: rdiCcmDefect
structMember.description: RDI defect detected, when remote MEP, for which timer has not expired since valid CCM was received, has reported RDI bit in its latest CCM.

structMember.name: remoteCcmDefect
structMember.description: Remote defect detected, when local MEP has not received valid CCMs from at least one of its defined remote MEPs.

structMember.name: xConCcmDefect
structMember.description: Cross-connect defect detected, when local MEP has received at least one CCM from either another MAID or from lower MD level.

enum.name: AvailStatus
enum.description: The availability status is used to qualify the operational state. It indicates why the operational state has changed its value.

enumMember.name: IN_TEST
enumMember.description: The resource is undergoing a test procedure. If the administrative state is locked or shutting down then normal users are precluded from using the resource.

enumMember.name: FAILED
enumMember.description: The resource has an internal fault that prevents it from operating.

enumMember.name: POWER_OFF
enumMember.description: The resource requires power to be applied and is not powered on.

enumMember.name: OFF_LINE
enumMember.description: The resource requires a routine operation to be performed. This routine operation is to place the resource online and make it available for use. The operation may be manual or automatic, or both. The operational state is disabled.

enumMember.name: OFF_DUTY
enumMember.description: The resource has been made inactive by an internal control process.

enumMember.name: DEPENDENCY
enumMember.description: The resource cannot operate because some other resource on which it depends is unavailable.

enumMember.name: DEGRADED
enumMember.description: The service available from the resource is degraded in some respect.

enumMember.name: NOT_INSTALLED
enumMember.description: The resource represented by the managed object is not present, or is incomplete.

enumMember.name: LOG_FULL
enumMember.description: This indicates a log full condition.

enumMember.name: DEPENDENCY_LOCKED
enumMember.description: The administrative state of a resource that this resource depends on is locked. or the availability status of the other resource is dependency locked.

enumMember.name: DEPENDENCY_FAILED
enumMember.description: The availability status of a resource that this resource depends on is failed or dependency failed.

enumMember.name: DEPENDENCY_SHUTTINGDOWN
enumMember.description: The administrative state of a resource that this resource depends on is shutting down. or the availability status of the other resource is dependency shutting down.

enum.name: MaintenanceAssociationType
enum.description: Type and format of maintenance association name.

enumMember.name: PRIMARY_VID
enumMember.description: Maintenance association name used in CFM messages, given by attribute vid.

enumMember.name: STRING
enumMember.description: Maintenance association name is specified as a string of 1 to 45 characters.

enumMember.name: INTEGER
enumMember.description: Maintenance association name is specified as integer (0-65535) within quotation marks.

enum.name: MaintenanceDomainType
enum.description: Type and format of maintenance domain name.

enumMember.name: NO_NAME
enumMember.description: No format specified, maintenanceDomainName has no meaning.

enumMember.name: DNS_BASED
enumMember.description: Domain name specified as globally unique text string of 1 to 43 characters derived from DNS name. Domain name is case-sensitive regarding DNS-based maintenance domains.

enumMember.name: MAC
enumMember.description:
Domain name given as MAC address + 2 octet (unsigned) integer, separated by dot (.).
Example: 12:23:34:45:56:67.123

enumMember.name: STRING
enumMember.description: Domain name specified as string of 1 to 43 characters.

enum.name: OperState
enum.description: The operational states of a resource.

enumMember.name: DISABLED
enumMember.description: The resource is totally inoperable.

enumMember.name: ENABLED
enumMember.description: The resource is partially or fully operable.

enum.name: RemoteMepState
enum.description: State of remote MEP state machine.

enumMember.name: RMEP_IDLE
enumMember.description: Momentary state during reset.

enumMember.name: RMEP_START
enumMember.description: Timer has not expired since state machine was reset, and no valid CCM has yet been received.

enumMember.name: RMEP_FAILED
enumMember.description: Timer has expired since state machine was last reset, and since latest valid CCM was received.

enumMember.name: RMEP_OK
enumMember.description: Timer has not expired since valid CCM was received.

class.name: EthernetOamLocalMep
class.description:
Ethernet OAM Local Maintenance association End Point.
Represents MEP for Ethernet OAM service. MEP is local to DU.
Ethernet OAM Service includes support for Connectivity Fault Management (CFM) capabilities for detecting, isolating, and reporting L2 connectivity faults.

validationRules.rule: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert test='((count(@encapsulation/@reservedBy[matches(., ".*,InterfaceIPv[46]=.*")]) gt 0) or (count(@encapsulation/@reservedBy[matches(., ".*,Bridge=.*")]) gt 0))'><value-of select ="."/>,encapsulation must refer to a VlanPort, EthernetPort or LagPort, which is referenced by an InterfaceIPv4, InterfaceIPv6 or Bridge.</assert> <assert test='are-distinct-values(@encapsulation/@reservedBy[matches(., ".*,EthernetOamLocalMep=.*")]/@maintenanceDomainLevel)'><value-of select ="."/>: All EthernetOamLocalMep MOs with encapsulation="<value-of select ="@encapsulation"/>" must have a unique maintenanceDomainLevel.</assert> <assert test='not(@maintenanceAssociationType eq 0 and string-length(@maintenanceAssociationName) gt 0)'><value-of select ="."/> If maintenanceAssociationType is set to PRIMARY_VID the maintenanceAssociationName must be empty.</assert> <assert test='not(@maintenanceDomainType eq 0 and string-length(@maintenanceDomainName) gt 0)'><value-of select ="."/> If maintenanceDomainType is set to NO_NAME the maintenanceDomainName must be empty.</assert> <assert test='not(@maintenanceDomainType eq 0 and string-length(@maintenanceAssociationName) gt 45)'><value-of select ="."/> If maintenanceDomainType is set to NO_NAME the maintenanceAssociationName must be at most 45 characters.</assert> <assert test='not((@maintenanceAssociationType eq 0 or @maintenanceAssociationType eq 2) and string-length(@maintenanceDomainName) gt 42)'><value-of select ="."/> If maintenanceAssociationType is set to PRIMARY_VID or INTEGER the maintenanceDomainName must be at most 42 characters.</assert> <assert test='not((@maintenanceAssociationType eq 1 and (@maintenanceDomainType eq 1 or @maintenanceDomainType eq 3)) and (string-length(@maintenanceDomainName) + string-length(@maintenanceAssociationName)) gt 44)'><value-of select ="."/> If maintenanceDomainType is set to DNS_BASED or STRING, the combined length of maintenanceAssociationName and maintenanceDomainName must be at most 44 characters.</assert> <assert test='not((@maintenanceAssociationType eq 1 and @maintenanceDomainType eq 2) and string-length(@maintenanceAssociationName) gt 36)'><value-of select ="."/> If maintenanceDomainType is set to MAC, the combined length of maintenanceAssociationName and maintenanceDomainName must be at most 44 characters, where maintenanceDomainName has 8 characters.</assert> <assert test='not(@maintenanceAssociationType eq 1 and string-length(@maintenanceAssociationName) eq 0)'><value-of select ="."/> If maintenanceAssociationType is set to STRING the maintenanceAssociationName length must be more than 0 chars.</assert> <assert test='not((@maintenanceDomainType eq 1 or @maintenanceDomainType eq 3) and string-length(@maintenanceDomainName) eq 0)'><value-of select ="."/> If maintenanceDomainType is set to STRING or DNS_BASED the maintenanceDomainName length must be more than 0 chars.</assert> <assert test='not(@maintenanceDomainType eq 2 and not (matches(@maintenanceDomainName, "[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}:[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}:[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}:[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}:[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}:[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}\.[0-9]{1,5}")))'><value-of select ="."/> If maintenanceDomainType is set to MAC the maintenanceDomainName must have the format "11:22:33:44:55:66.1234".</assert> <assert test='not(@maintenanceAssociationType eq 2 and not (matches(@maintenanceAssociationName, "[0-9]{1,5}")))'><value-of select ="."/> If maintenanceAssociationType is set to INTEGER the maintenanceAssociationName must be an integer within the range 0-65535".</assert> <assert test='not(@maintenanceAssociationType eq 0 and not((@encapsulation[matches(., ".*,VlanPort=.*")]) and (@encapsulation/@isTagged)))'><value-of select ="."/> If maintenanceAssociationType is set to PRIMARY_VID the attribute encapsulation must refer to a VlanPort MO and the VlanPort attribute isTagged must be set to true.</assert> <assert test='are-distinct-values(EthernetOamRemoteMep/@mepIdentifier)'><value-of select ="."/> mepIdentifier must be unique among all EthernetOamRemoteMep MOs for an EthernetOamLocalMep MO.</assert> <assert test='(every $remoteMepIdentifier in EthernetOamRemoteMep/@mepIdentifier satisfies ($remoteMepIdentifier ne @mepIdentifier))'><value-of select ="."/> mepIdentifier for an EthernetOamLocalMep MO can not be equal to a mepIdentifier of it's underlying EthernetOamRemoteMep MOs.</assert> <assert test='not(@encapsulation[matches(., ".*,VlanPort=.*")] and @encapsulation/@lowLatencySwitching)'><value-of select ="."/> EthernetOamLocalMep MO cannot refer to VlanPort MO with lowLatencySwitching set to true.</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

class.dependenciesScript: <schema xmlns="http://purl.oclc.org/dsdl/schematron"> <pattern> <rule> <assert test='((count(@encapsulation/@reservedBy[matches(., ".*,InterfaceIPv[46]=.*")]) gt 0) or gt 44)'><value-of select ="."/> If maintenanceDomainType is set to DNS_BASED or STRING, the combined length of maintenanceAssociationName and maintenanceDomainName must be at most 44 characters.</assert> <assert test='not((@maintenanceAssociationType eq 1 and @maintenanceDomainType eq 2) and string-length(@maintenanceAssociationName) gt 36)'><value-of select ="."/> If maintenanceDomainType is set to MAC, the combined length of maintenanceAssociationName and maintenanceDomainName must be at most 44 characters, where maintenanceDomainName has 8 characters.</assert> <assert test='not(@maintenanceAssociationType eq 1 and string-length(@maintenanceAssociationName) eq 0)'><value-of select ="."/> If maintenanceAssociationType is set to STRING the maintenanceAssociationName length must be more than 0 chars.</assert> <assert test='not((@maintenanceDomainType eq 1 or @maintenanceDomainType eq 3) and string-length(@maintenanceDomainName) eq 0)'><value-of select ="."/> If maintenanceDomainType is set to STRING or DNS_BASED the maintenanceDomainName length must be more than 0 chars.</assert> <assert test='not(@maintenanceDomainType eq 2 and not (matches(@maintenanceDomainName, "[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}:[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}:[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}:[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}:[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}:[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}\.[0-9]{1,5}")))'><value-of select ="."/> If maintenanceDomainType is set to MAC the maintenanceDomainName must have the format "11:22:33:44:55:66.1234".</assert> <assert test='not(@maintenanceAssociationType eq 2 and not (matches(@maintenanceAssociationName, "[0-9]{1,5}")))'><value-of select ="."/> If maintenanceAssociationType is set to INTEGER the maintenanceAssociationName must be an integer within the range 0-65535".</assert> <assert test='not(@maintenanceAssociationType eq 0 and not((@encapsulation[matches(., ".*,VlanPort=.*")]) and (@encapsulation/@isTagged)))'><value-of select ="."/> If maintenanceAssociationType is set to PRIMARY_VID the attribute encapsulation must refer to a VlanPort MO and the VlanPort attribute isTagged must be set to true.</assert> <assert test='are-distinct-values(EthernetOamRemoteMep/@mepIdentifier)'><value-of select ="."/> mepIdentifier must be unique among all EthernetOamRemoteMep MOs for an EthernetOamLocalMep MO.</assert> <assert test='(every $remoteMepIdentifier in EthernetOamRemoteMep/@mepIdentifier satisfies ($remoteMepIdentifier ne @mepIdentifier))'><value-of select ="."/> mepIdentifier for an EthernetOamLocalMep MO can not be equal to a mepIdentifier of it's underlying EthernetOamRemoteMep MOs.</assert> <assert test='not(@encapsulation[matches(., ".*,VlanPort=.*")] and @encapsulation/@lowLatencySwitching)'><value-of select ="."/> EthernetOamLocalMep MO cannot refer to VlanPort MO with lowLatencySwitching set to true.</assert> </rule> </pattern> </schema>

attribute.name: availabilityStatus
attribute.description:
The availability status.
It contains details about operationalState.

attribute.name: ccmEnabled
attribute.description: Whether MO transmits and receives CCM messages.

attribute.name: ccmInterval
attribute.description: CCM interval to be used.

attribute.name: encapsulation
attribute.description: Reference to underlying encapsulation that can be MO type EthernetPort, VlanPort or LagPort.
attribute.dependencies: VlanPort MO, to which this encapsulation refers, must be referenced by MO type InterfaceIPv4, InterfaceIPv6, or Bridge. If maintenanceAssociationType is set to PRIMARY_VID this attribute must refer to VlanPort MO, where attribute isTagged must be set to true. EthernetOamLocalMep MO cannot refer to VlanPort MO with lowLatencySwitching set to true.

attribute.name: ethernetOamAlarmConfig
attribute.description: Which defects raise CfmFault alarm.

attribute.name: ethernetOamLocalMepId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: maintenanceAssociationName
attribute.description:
MA name.
If maintenanceAssociationType is PRIMARY_VID, this attribute is not used. Primary VID, defined by underlying VlanPort MO, is used to identify CFM messages.
Maximum length of maintenanceDomainName + maximum length of maintenanceAssociationName is 44 octets.
attribute.dependencies: If maintenanceAssociationType is set to PRIMARY_VID this attribute must be empty. If maintenanceDomainType is set to NO_NAME this attribute must be at most 45 characters. If maintenanceDomainType is set to DNS_BASED or STRING, combined length of maintenanceAssociationName and maintenanceDomainName must be at most 44 chars. If maintenanceDomainType is set to MAC, combined length of maintenanceAssociationName and maintenanceDomainName must be at most 44 characters, where maintenanceDomainName has 8 characters. If maintenanceAssociationType is set to STRING this attribute length must be more than 0 characters. If maintenanceAssociationType is set to INTEGER this attribute must be integer within range 0-65535.

attribute.name: maintenanceAssociationType
attribute.description:
Type and format of maintenanceAssociationName.
If this attribute is set to PRIMARY_VID, encapsulation must refer to a VlanPort MO, where isTagged attribute must be set to true.

attribute.name: maintenanceDomainLevel
attribute.description:
MD level.
Specifies nesting relationship between maintenance domains.
For each value of this attribute, only one EthernetOamLocalMep MO can be configured for each MO type VlanPort, EthernetPort, or LagPort, that is referred by encapsulation attribute.
attribute.dependencies: All EthernetOamLocalMep MOs with same encapsulation that refers to MO type VlanPort, EthernetPort or LagPort MO, must have unique maintenanceDomainLevel.

attribute.name: maintenanceDomainName
attribute.description: MD name.
attribute.dependencies: If maintenanceDomainType is set to NO_NAME this attribute must be empty. If maintenanceAssociationType is set to PRIMARY_VID or INTEGER this attribute must be at most 42 characters. If maintenanceDomainType is set to DNS_BASED or STRING, combined length of maintenanceAssociationName and maintenanceDomainName must be at most 44 chars. If maintenanceDomainType is set to MAC, combined length of maintenanceAssociationName and maintenanceDomainName must be at most 44 characters, where maintenanceDomainName has 8 characters. If maintenanceDomainType is set to STRING or DNS_BASED this attribute length must be more than 0 characters. If maintenanceDomainType is set to MAC this attribute must have format 11:22:33:44:55:66.1234.

attribute.name: maintenanceDomainType
attribute.description: Type and format of maintenanceDomainName.

attribute.name: mepDefect
attribute.description:
Indication of current defects.
Specification: IEEE 802.1Q-2014

attribute.name: mepIdentifier
attribute.description: Specifies the local MEP Identifier.

attribute.name: operationalState
attribute.description: The operational state.

attribute.name: pcp
attribute.description: Priority value for frames originated from MEP. Replies to CFM requests from other nodes are assigned same PCP value as request message.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.

class.name: EthernetOamRemoteMep
class.description:
Ethernet OAM Remote Maintenance association End Point.
Represents MEP for Ethernet OAM service in another node.
Facilitates supervision of CCM from specific remote MEP.

attribute.name: ethernetOamRemoteMepId
attribute.description: The value component of the RDN.

attribute.name: failedOrOkTime
attribute.description:
Time when Remote MEP state machine last entered either "RMEP_FAILED" or "RMEP_OK" state. Time is expressed as string containing Date and Time (UTC) in format yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss
Example: 2015-01-01 00:00:00

attribute.name: macAddress
attribute.description:
MAC address of remote MEP discovered from incoming CCM frames.
If no valid CCM has been received from remote MEP, attribute has value 00:00:00:00:00:00 .

attribute.name: mepIdentifier
attribute.description:
Identifier of remote MEP.
Must be unique among all EthernetOamRemoteMep MOs for EthernetOamLocalMep MO.

attribute.name: rdi
attribute.description: Whether RDI bit was set in latest valid CCM received from remote MEP.

attribute.name: remoteMepState
attribute.description:
State of remote MEP state machine.
State machine monitors reception of valid CCMs from remote MEP.

attribute.name: userLabel
attribute.description: Label for free use.
